channel.title: Opinion on reviving dead threads?
channel.description:
I think that if the thread seems to be useful and it will benefit the community, it should revived. However, if the thread hasn’t been replied into in a while, should it brought back up or just left alone?
Ex: [The Genre_Overview thread](https://disco.auxy.co/t/genres-overview/8067)

item.title: Opinion on reviving dead threads?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Agreed. If a thread is still relevant it’s not closed. If the thread is super off topic or gets off topic then it gets closed. Age is kind of not relevant in closure…

Read full topic
